body:
Hello again its me for another tactic's here is my idea about the transportaction is like chest and emtpy minecart is use to transport safely but remember there is a player that will ruin it please make sure you make a protection. And always know the rail cannot be place in glass that makes a dangerous way it does. Thank you for seeing this and hope you like it. ;)  This is a Minecart Chest Transporter http://i.imgur.com/mPAqmKK.png                And this is Minecart Player Transporter  http://i.imgur.com/FuRqIsG.jpg
HOPE YOU LIKE IT!   

 The hopper does low dont have image of it.

title: Minecart Transporter

replies.body: Remember Minecart Hopper will not work i tried everything with redstone but still nothing

replies.body: Hello iam just going to know you if you craft one it gives you 16 but that is not enough make sure you more rail! And if there is redstone plus gold you make a power rail but each map had gold no redstone so do that that i uploaded.
